item.title: Apple Denies Musk's ChatGPT Favoritism Claims, Says App Store Has No Bias
item.description: Apple today responded to Elon Musk’s claims that the App Store favors OpenAI’s ChatGPT app, telling Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman that the ‌App Store‌ is “fair and free of bias.” The App Store is

item.title: Musk threatens to sue Apple so Grok can get top App Store ranking
item.description: Musk threatens to sue Apple to get Grok to top spot in App Store rankings.

item.title: Japan Law Will Require Apple to Allow Non-WebKit Browsers on iPhone
item.description: Japan’s Mobile Software Competition Act will require Apple to allow non-WebKit web browsers in the App Store on the iPhone later this year. Specifically, the law “forbids designated providers from pre

item.title: Apple Overhauls App Store Age Ratings
item.description: Apple has announced an overhaul of the App Store’s age rating system across all of its platforms. The company has added three new age rating tiers — 13+, 16+, and 18+ — to the existing 4+ and 9+ class

item.title: Apple's Latest App Store Changes Satisfy EU, No More Fines Coming
item.description: The European Union is set to accept the June updates that Apple made to its App Store to comply with the Digital Markets Act, reports Reuters. As a result, Apple will not face daily fines for non-comp
